name: Infinite Golf (itch) (Matiasmcxd)
description:
-Use the [ LEFT MOUSE BUTTON ] to shoot the ball

-the ball is going to move in the direction of the mouse

-GREEN BLOCKS and RED SPIKES are dangerous

-PURPLE BLOCKS will make the ball bounce

-When you finish a level, you win 1 second

-There is a chance that a yellow ball will appear, if you collect it, you win 2 extra seconds

-PINK CROSSES let you move the ball again

-BROWN BLOCKS let you move the ball again BUT you need to hit them twice to break them

-INVERT CONTROLS makes the ball go in the opposite direction of the mouse
